The Problem

The Pain Point

Small to mid-sized leagues struggle with outdated, messy systems:

  • Disorganized spreadsheets prone to errors
  • Multiple apps for different needs
  • Time-consuming manual data entry
  • Lack of professional polish

The Result

League organizers waste time on admin work instead of growing their community, and players miss out on the streamlined, engaging experience they deserve.

Competitive Landscape

Direct Competitors

  • Sport-specific apps (pickleball scorekeepers, darts tracking)
  • Existing league management tools (often outdated or clunky)

Indirect Competitors

  • Google Sheets / Excel
  • Facebook groups for schedules
  • Ad hoc solutions combining multiple apps

Our Competitive Advantage

  • Multi-sport flexibility in a single platform
  • Automated, detailed stat tracking
  • Clean, modern interface built for both organizers and players
  • Faster onboarding and setup compared to traditional tools
5 / 6

Marketing Strategy

Phase 1 Warm Network (0-3 Months)

Leverage personal connections in wealthy suburban communities. Goal: 3-5 test leagues

Phase 2 Local Expansion (3-6 Months)

Direct outreach to country clubs, sports bars, rec centers. In-person demos

Phase 3 Referral Growth (6-12 Months)

Case studies, testimonials, referral program, targeted digital ads

Why This Works

Warm introductions
Higher trust & faster adoption

Local concentration
Easier support & networking

Early success stories
Credibility for expansion
